title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your data.

sections.heading: Information we collect
body: We collect information you provide directly (like name and email), and automatically through product analytics (usage events, device, and basic technical metadata).

sections.heading: How we use information
body: We use your data to operate DirectPlay, improve learning outcomes, personalize your experience, and communicate important updates.

sections.heading: Your choices
body: You can request data access or deletion at any time. Contact us if you have questions about privacy or your rights.

sections.heading: Contact
body: Questions about privacy? Reach us at support@directplay.in
